item.title: Uneven surface, 15th November
item.description:
Just as you drive on and off the bridge, there is a very big dip in the road making everything fly up in the cab of a hgv and often damaging the load in the trailer. This has been there for a very long time now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): M25, Brentwood

item.description:
Please collect bulky domestic waste items and uncollected contaminated recycling bin.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): John Wilson Street, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge tree at risk of a double decker bus colliding with it when 244 bus goes double decker soon., 15th November
item.description:
There is a huge tree on Whinchat Road that angles into the roadway. Next to it is two speed humps, which will force buses to go over them. The single decker buses currently on 244 + 380 do this with no problem at the moment but as 244 bus is going double decker next month if a bus goes over the speed hump in the directed path that it should do, I think it will hit this tree. This tree needs to either be removed or the humps need to be made into a hump in the middle of the road to avoid a bus hitting the tree as the tree comes into the road at an angle and as i have seen some of the bus drivers from that bus company go ahead london aren’t the best and must have got their licence from cerale box and as a local resident i do worry a bad nasty people hurting accident will be caused if this is not dealt with before they go double deckers on 244 next month.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Whinchat Road, Thamesmead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bus shelter has dog muck smeared on panel and dogs muck smeared around the vicinity, 15th November
item.description:
Dog muck smeared on the panel of shelter and around the vicinity been like this all week. This is the bus shelter outside Willowdene school on wickam lane Buses on bus shelter are going towards bexleyheath, in case I haven’t properly identified on the map 96 and 422 buses.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wickham Lane, Plumstead
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hartham Road, Holloway, London Borough of Islington
